books.Name: Close to the Machine
books.Author: Ellen Ullman
books.Desc: Close to the Machine is a book about the history and culture of Unix programming from its earliest days in 1969 to 2003 when it was published, covering both genetic derivations such as BSD and conceptual ones such as Linux.

books.Name: The Art of Unix Programming
books.Author: Eric Raymond
books.Desc: The Art of Unix Programming by Eric S. Raymond is a book about the history and culture of Unix programming from its earliest days in 1969 to 2003 when it was published, covering both genetic derivations such as BSD and conceptual ones such as Linux.

books.Name: The Art of Computer Programming
books.Author: Donald Knuth
books.Desc: The Art of Computer Programming (sometimes known by its initials TAOCP) is a comprehensive monograph written by Donald Knuth that covers many kinds of programming algorithms and their analysis.

books.Name: Free Software, Free Society
books.Author: Richard M. Stallman
books.Desc: Free Software, Free Society: Selected Essays of Richard M. Stallman is a book that collects the writing of Richard M. Stallman. The first edition was published in 2002 by GNU Press under the GNU Free Documentation License.

books.Name: Patterns of Software
books.Author: Richard P. Gabriel
books.Desc: Patterns of Software is a book that collects the writing of Richard M. Stallman. The first edition was published in 2002 by GNU Press under the GNU Free Documentation License.

books.Name: Innovation Happens Elsewhere
books.Author: Richard P. Gabriel
books.Desc: Innovation Happens Elsewhere is a book by Keith Curtis about free software and its importance in the computing industry, specifically about its impact on Microsoft and the proprietary software development model.

books.Name: After the Software Wars
books.Author: Keith Curtis
books.Desc: After the Software Wars is a book by Keith Curtis about free software and its importance in the computing industry, specifically about its impact on Microsoft and the proprietary software development model.

books.Name: The Psychology of Computer Programming
books.Author: Gerald M. Weinberg
books.Desc: Wikipedia does not have an article with this exact name. Please search for The Psychology of Computer Programming in Wikipedia to check for alternative titles or spellings.

books.Name: The Practice of Programming
books.Author: Brian W. Kernighan
books.Desc: The Practice of Programming (ISBN 0-201-61586-X) by Brian W. Kernighan and Rob Pike is a 1999 book about computer programming and software engineering, published by Addison-Wesley.

books.Name: The Best Software Writing I
books.Author: Joel Spolsky
books.Desc: The Best Software Writing I is a 1999 book about computer programming and software engineering, published by Addison-Wesley.
